power4mome 0.0.1.3

Package index

Main Functions

All-in-one functions for common tasks.

power4test() print(<power4test>)
Estimate the Power of a Test
power4test_by_n() get_rejection_rates_by_n()
Power By Sample Sizes
power4test_by_pop_es() get_rejection_rates_by_pop_es()
Power By Effect Sizes
get_rejection_rates()
Rejection Rates of All Tests

Test Functions

Built-in functions for do common tests such as testing indirect effects and model parameters.

test_indirect_effect()
Test an Indirect Effect
test_moderation()
Test All Moderation Effects
test_index_of_mome()
Test a Moderated Mediation Effect
test_parameters()
Test All Free Parameters

Advanced Functions

For advanced users to do the power analysis step-by-step or build a customized workflow.

ptable_pop() model_matrices_pop()
Generate the Population Model
sim_data() print(<sim_data>)
Simulate Datasets Based on a Model
fit_model()
Fit a Model to a List of Datasets
gen_mc()
Generate Monte Carlo Estimates
gen_boot()
Generate Bootstrap Estimates
sim_out() print(<sim_out>)
Create a 'sim_out' Object
do_test()
Do a Test on Each Replication

Helper Functions

Miscellaneous helper functions

summarize_tests() print(<test_summary_list>) print(<test_summary>) print(<test_out_list>)
Summarize Test Results
pop_es_yaml()
Parse YAML-Stye 'pop_es'

Generate Random Numbers

Functions for generating one variable from a specific distribution.

rbeta_rs()
Random Beta Variable
rbeta_rs2()
Random Beta Variable (User Range)
rbinary_rs()
Random Binary Variable
rexp_rs()
Random Exponential Variable
rlnorm_rs()
Random Lognormal Variable
rpgnorm_rs()
Random Generalized Normal Variable
rt_rs()
Random t Distribution Variable
runif_rs()
Generate random numbers from a uniform distribution with desired population mean and SD
